resp = client.index(
    index="library",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "title": "Book #1",
        "rating": 200.1
    },
)
print(resp)

    index="library",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "title": "Book #2",
        "rating": 1.7
    },
)
print(resp1)

    index="library",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "title": "Book #3",
        "rating": 0.1
    },
)
print(resp2)

resp3 = client.search(
    filter_path="hits.hits._source",
    source="title",
    sort="rating:desc",
)
print(resp3)
